document_data.name: Knotted Rope Tavern
document_data.mainbody: The '''Knotted Rope Tavern''' was a tavern in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] in the late-15{{th}} century [[DR]].The date for all Year 1 RPGA sanctioned adventures is considered to be [[1479 DR]] for the purposes of this wiki.
document_data.History: Some time following the [[Spellplague]], a memorial was set up in the tavern dedicated to all the captains that had lost their lives to [[seawraith]]s in [[Deepwater Harbor]]. This included an image of a captain by the name of [[Scrimshaw (character)|Scrimshaw]].
